title: The Revenge Game
description: Revenge is a game best played blind.Four friends (Wes, Corey, Brandon, and Greg) from a wealthy New Jersey town are hiding secrets from the world...and each other. But for how long?As high school graduation and a trip to Cape Cod near, they begin to realize that everything is coming out whether they like it or not.But will they be able to stop it before one of them is the first casualty of the revenge game?
author: Cole Bosher
